metadata.title: CVE-2019-5840 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Incorrect security UI in popup blocker in Google Chrome on iOS prior to75.0.3770.80 allowed a remote attacker to bypass navigation restrictionsvia a crafted HTML page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-5840` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 75.0.3770.142-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 75.0.3770.142-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 75.0.3770.142-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 75.0.3770.142-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 75.0.3770.142-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '75.0.3770.142-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
